page.title: 08THE M27 AND M271 MOTORWAYS.
page.content: The{M27}runs from Portsmouth in the east to Cadnam on the New Forest border in the West .The{M271}was built at the same time as the M27.The length of the M27 is 46.6 kms and the M271 is 5 kms long. There are 36 bridges 3 retaining walls and 1 service area at Rownhams . Construction of the first part of the M27 motorway was completed in 1973 and the road opened to all traffic in 1975 .Later more sections were built from Chilwoth to Cadnam through Rownhams . Finally it was built from Hedge End to Chilwoth around Southampton which completed the M27. Southampton which completed the M27.
